oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A mixed finite element method for fourth order eigenvalue problems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NATARAJ, N
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: plate-bending problems
distributed-memory environments
implementation
approximations
convergence
mixed finite element method
eigenvalues
eigenvectors
lagrange multiplier
orthotropic problem
vibration analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A mixed finite element method for approximating eigenpairs of IV order elliptic eigenvalue problems with Dirichlet boundary conditions has been given. The method can be applied to the vibration analysis of anisotropic/orthotropic/isotropic/biharmonic plates. Computer implementation procedures for this mixed method are given along with the results of numerical experiments. (C) 2009
